long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get the live transcriptions from a vowel.com meeting and send them to pinkshoggoth.com to generate live insights about the conversation on the meeting.
This extension should be installed by anyone who makes use of vowel.com for meetings and wants to have a deeper understanding of the conversation by getting live insights powered by Pink Shoggoth AI.
